column2: ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. AT THE CAMPIGN LOCATION. SETTING UP FOR THE NIGHT. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE ELIMINATED TWO SCUD LAUNCHERS. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. LANDING ZONE IN SIGHT. GET READY FOR INSERTION. OVER.
GO GET THEM ALPHA. AND GOOD LUCK. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. UNDERSTOOD, GOOD WORK. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. BE CAREFUL AND KEEP IT QUIET. OVER.
Your mission is scuds, scuds and nothing but scuds
